title: Math 300Z
text:
Math 300Z is the prototype for scheduled revisions to Math 300. The revisions apply only to Lessons 19 and up; the first 18 lessons come from Math 300.
Lesson 19. Topic: Variation (Mar 3) Reading, Activity: measuring by eye
Lesson 20: Topic: DAGs and simulation (Mar 7) Reading, Activity: Smoking and birthweight
Lesson 21: Topic: Signal and noise (Mar 9) Reading, Activity:
Lesson 22: Topic: Sampling variation (Mar 13) Reading, Activity:
Lesson 23: Topic: Confidence intervals (Mar 15) Reading, Activity:
Lesson 24: Topic: Effect size (Mar 17) Reading, Activity:
Lesson 25: Topic: Prediction mechanics (Mar 19) Reading, Activity:
Lesson 26: Topic: Prediction intervals (Mar 23) Reading, Activity:
Lesson 27: REVIEW of lessons 19-26 :: Reading
Lesson 28: Topic: Covariates :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 29: Topic: Covariates eat variance :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 30: Topic: Confounding :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 31: Topic: Spurious correlation :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 32: Topic: Experiment & random assignment :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 33: Topic: Measuring and accumulating risk :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 34: Topic: Constructing a classifier :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 35: Topic: Accounting for prevalence :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 36: Topic: Hypothesis testing :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 37: Topic: Calculating a p-value :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 38: Topic: False discovery with hypothesis testing :: Reading, Activity:
Lesson 39: REVIEW of lessons 28-38 :: Reading
Lesson 40: Review of entire course

title: Math 300Z
text:
Course textbooks


For Lessons 19-39, the textbook is Lessons in Statistical Thinking

title: Math 300Z
text:
Software
The POSIT.cloud workspaces will already have the packages installed. If you are running RStudio on your laptop (that is, not in a browser), the following command will install the packages.
install.packages(c("mosaic", "ggplot", "dplyr", "openintro", "moderndive", "nycflights13", "knitr"))
# addition package for Math 300Z
remotes::install_github("dtkaplan/math300")

A note on computing summaries of data

title: Math 300Z
section: First half of Math 300, Jan. and Feb. 2023
text:
First half of Math 300, Jan. and Feb. 2023


For Lessons 1-18, the textbook is Statistical Inference via Data Science




Data, graphics, wrangling
Reading: SIDS Chapters 1 through 4

Data with R
Scatterplots
Linegraphs, histograms, facets
Boxplots and barcharts
filter and summarize
group_by, mutate, arrange
join, select, rename, & top n
Importing data
Case study/review
GR1 (chapters 1-4)

Regression
Readings 11. SLR: Continuous x 12. SLR: Discrete x 13. SLR: Related topics 14. Multiple regression: Numerical & discrete 15. Multiple regression: Two numerical 16. Multiple regression: Related topics 17. Multiple regression: Conclusion/review 18. GR 2 (chapters 5-6)
